Package me.julb.springbootstarter.web.controllers

Class CaughtExceptionAdviceController

java.lang.Object
me.julb.springbootstarter.web.controllers.CaughtExceptionAdviceController
@ControllerAdvice @Order(-2147483648) public class CaughtExceptionAdviceController extends Object
A controller advice defined to catch all global exceptions.
